snippet: An Afghan civilian who drove a stolen vehicle onto a runway ramp as a plane carrying Defense Secretary Leon E. Panetta landed Wednesday has died of his injuries.
abstract: Defense Secretary Leon E Panetta says that he does not believe that the Afghan who crashed a stolen pickup truck near his plane, and then emerged from the truck in flames, was trying to attack him; some defense officials speculate though that the Afghan, who was an interpreter for coalition forces, may have known that someone of importance was arriving in Afghanistan.
lead_paragraph: An Afghan civilian who drove a stolen vehicle onto a runway ramp as a plane carrying Defense Secretary Leon E. Panetta landed Wednesday has died of his injuries.

headline.seo: Panetta Says Afghan Who Died in Attack Did Not Target Him
headline.main: Panetta Says He Was Not the Target of an Attack
headline.print_headline: Panetta Says He Was Not The Target Of an Attack

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
